description:
Given an integer array nums, representing the number of chocolates in the bag where 1<=i<=N and N is the length of Array nums, Alice and Bob are best friends who want to share an equal number of chocolates between one another return true if they can partition the array into two subsets such that the sum of the elements in both subsets is equal or false otherwise.

Constraints:

1 <= nums.length <= 200

1 <= nums[i] <= 100

Example:

Input: nums = [1,5,11,5]

Output: true
title: Equal choclates sharing
